verses.text: \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* barrenness \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Palestines \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Gerara.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H3381"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w stay|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* sojourn \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w fulfill|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w posterity|strong="H2233"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* precepts \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w observed|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* ceremonies \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w laws|strong="H8451"\w*.
\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Gerara.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* confess \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w thinking|strong="H0559"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* beauty.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* very many \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w passed|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* abode \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Palestines \w looking|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H8259"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w window|strong="H2474"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* playing \w with|strong="H3117"\w* Rebecca \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0802"\w* \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* evident \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*: \w why|strong="H0349"\w* didst thou feign \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*? \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* feared \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w sake|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou deceived \w us|strong="H5921"\w*? \w Some|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* might \w have|strong="H4592"\w* \w lain|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou hadst \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* great \w sin|strong="H0817"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w He|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w sowed|strong="H2232"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* hundredfold: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* enriched, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* prospering \w and|strong="H1980"\w* increasing, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w became|strong="H1431"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w possessions|strong="H4735"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H7065"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* family. Wherefore \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Palestines envying \w him|strong="H0853"\w*,

\w Stopped|strong="H5640"\w* \w up|strong="H5640"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wells|strong="H0875"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* digged, \w filling|strong="H4390"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w up|strong="H5640"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*:

Insomuch \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w* \w himself|strong="H0413"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*: Depart \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art become \w much|strong="H3966"\w* mightier \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* departed \w and|strong="H8033"\w* came \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* torrent \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Gerara, \w to|strong="H8033"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* digged \w again|strong="H7725"\w* other \w wells|strong="H0875"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* servants \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* digged, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Palestines \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* old \w stopped|strong="H5640"\w* \w up|strong="H5640"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* digged \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* torrent, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* there \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w herdsmen|strong="H7473"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* Gerara strove \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w herdsmen|strong="H7473"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. Wherefore \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w*, \w on|strong="H7121"\w* occasion \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* happened, Calumny.

\w And|strong="H8034"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* digged \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w*; \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H7121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* quarrelled \w likewise|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H8034"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, Enmity.

Going forward \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thence, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* digged \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* thereof, Latitude, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w room|strong="H7337"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7337"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w increase|strong="H6509"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H8033"\w* \w place|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H8033"\w* Bersabee,

\w Where|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Abraham’s|strong="H0085"\w* \w sake|strong="H5668"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* commanded \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w dig|strong="H3738"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* \w well|strong="H0875"\w*.

\w To|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H6635"\w* place \w when|strong="H1980"\w* \w Abimelech|strong="H0040"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* Ochozath \w his|strong="H0413"\w* friend, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Phicol|strong="H6369"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* soldiers \w came|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* Gerara,

\w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w a|strong="H0935"\w* man whom \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w thrust|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*,

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H7971"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w harm|strong="H7451"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w part|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thine, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H5060"\w* \w thing|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w hurt|strong="H5060"\w* thee: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee \w away|strong="H7971"\w* increased \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
